titleStmt.title: The true and faithful discharge of relative duties, is a very great honour and ornament to the doctrine of the gospel without, which the talk of Godliness, and profession of religion, is vain; and therefore all Christians should labour to understand their relative duties, and be careful and conscionable in the discharge of them.

notesStmt.note: Duties of wives, husbands, children, parents, servants, and masters.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
